title: NLFS: Allen & Ginter Clarkson, Comiskey, and Mulvey
author: Kris19

posts.post_title: NLFS: Allen & Ginter Clarkson, Comiskey, and Mulvey
posts.post_content:
As best I can tell, these are cutouts from an original poster or album, then backed with an original N28 back. The cards are thicker than normal. 

NLFS delivered, net to me, for the group of three. PayPal preferred.

Please PM me or email me at [url]kris.sweckard@sbcglobal.net[/url] to purchase or with any questions. Thanks!
Price reduced. Will also consider offers for individual cards.
